g <- ggplot(data = d, aes(x = MaxLongevity_m, y = Brain_Size_Species_Mean)) 
g <- g + geom_point()
g <- g + geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x)
g <- g + geom_text(aes(label = paste(d, sep = "")),
  parse = TRUE)
g <- g + geom_text() + annotate("text", label = "y=1.218x+248.952", x=200, y=200)
g
